patterns: How much does the stay per day cost?

responses: The stay costs 6500 pesos on weekdays and 7500 Pesos on the weekends!

The cost depends on the day, 6500 pesos for the weekdays and 7500

patterns: What can we see in DRT House?
What is the purpose of DRT House?
responses:
Diamante Reyes Transient House (DRT House) with Infinity Pool is a complete 
	    medium size house with a great mountain view. If you love nature, you will love 
	    to stay in the DRT house.

STAYCATION, PAHINGAHAN, FAMILY REUNION, BONDING RELAXATION 
	    AND NATURE for you and with your loved one or with the whole family, all 
	    available at DRT House!

DRT House with Infinity Pool is a small private resort that you can rent to 
	    stay with the beautiful mountain view of the Dona Remedios Trinidad (DRT).

DRT House with Infinity Pool is located at  Sitio Kutad, Tanawan St. Pulong
	    Sampaloc DRT Bulacan. We are 5 mins away from Carribean Waves
	    Waterpark Resort.

We are located at Sitio Kutad, Tanawan St. Pulong Sampaloc DRT Bulacan.
	    We are 5 mins away from Carribean Waves Waterpark Resort.

You can locate us on Google Maps, just search for DRT House.
	    We are 5 mins away from Carribean Waves Waterpark Resort.

You can use the Waze application to navigate to the location of DRT House.
	    We are 5 mins away from Carribean Waves Waterpark Resort.

patterns: How many people can stay per room?
How many person can fit in your room?
How many person can stay in the teepee house?
How many people can fit in Bahay Kubo?
How many person can stay in Main House?
responses:
We have one main house, one bahay kubo and two teepee house. The main
	    house can fit 10 persons with the double deck bed, a queen size bed, L-shaped
	    sofa, sofa-bed, and mattresses. We also have a one bahay kubo with a terrace
	    that can accommodate 3-5 people and two teepee house that can
	    accommodate 1-2 persons.

There is a main home, a bahay kubo, and two teepee houses. The double deck
	    bed, queen size bed, L-shaped sofa, sofa-bed, and mattresses in the Main
	    House can accommodate ten people. We also have two teepee houses that can
	    accommodate 1-2 people and one Bahay kubo with a terrace that can
	    accommodate 3-5 people.

One main house, one bahay kubo, and two teepee houses are available.
	    With the double deck bed, a queen size bed, an L-shaped sofa, a sofa-bed, and
	    mattresses, the Main House can sleep up to ten people. We also have one Bahay
	    Kubo with a terrace that can sleep 3-5 people and two teepee houses that can
	    sleep 1-2 people.

patterns: What is your Check-in and check-out time?
Can i adjust my check in time?
Can i extend my check out time?
How many hours is our stay?
responses:
For all of our lovely guest, we have 22 hours to stay in our DRT House and
	    our check-in time is 4:00 PM and the check-out time is 2:00 PM after the
	    day of your check-in. This is strictly followed by all of our guest because we
	    have daily guest and we need to follow the protocols and make
	    sanitize the DRT House for our next guest.

We have 22 hours to stay at our DRT House for all of our wonderful guests,
	    with check-in at 4:00 PM and check-out at 2:00 PM after the day of your
	    check-in. Because we have daily guests and need to follow the regulations and
	    disinfect the DRT House for our next visitor, this is carefully
	    followed by all of our guests.

We have 22 hours to remain at our DRT House for all of our wonderful guests,
	    and our check-in time is 4:00 PM and check-out time is 2:00 PM after the
	    day of your check-in. All of our guests carefully adhere to this since we have
	    daily guests and need to follow regulations and disinfect the
	    DRT House for our next guest.

patterns: How can I make a reservation?
Can I make a reservation on the phone?
How do I make a confirmed reservation?
responses:
You can make your reservation by sending 2,000 Pesos in our GCash account and
	    by confirming this transaction we confirm your information for your reservation.
	    Our GCash number is 09326515696. Reservation fee is non-refundable if
	    you cancel your booking.

You may reserve your booking by depositing 2,000 pesos into our GCash account,
	    and by confirming this transaction, we will confirm your reservation details.
	    09326515696 is our GCash number. Reservation fee is non-refundable if
	    you cancel your booking.

We have a reservation fee of 2,000 Pesos to confirm your booking on your specified
	    date. Our GCash number is 09326515696. Reservation fee is non-refundable
	    if you cancel your booking.

You may reach us by calling 09326515696 or try messaging us on
	    Facebook by searching DRT House.

You may contact us by calling 09326515696 or try messaging us on
	    Facebook by searching DRT House.

You may reach us by messaging 09326515696 or try messaging us on
	    Facebook by searching DRT House.

patterns: What do you offer your guests?
What services can you offer to us?
responses:
DRT House has one main house with air conditioning, infinity pool, queen size bed,
	    double deck bed, sofa bed, L-shape sofa, 32" flat screen tv, refrigerator, bluetooth
	    speaker, gas stove, rice cooker, kettle, complete kitchen utensils, fresh linen
	    and blankets, ihawan, and one Bahay Kubo that can accommodate 3-5
	    people and two teepee houses that can accommodate 1-3 people each.

We have one main house with air conditioning, infinity pool, queen size bed,

	    system, gas stove, rice cooker, kettle, complete kitchen utensils, fresh linen
	    and blankets, ihawan, and one Bahay Kubo that can accommodate 3-5
	    people and two teepee houses that can accommodate 1-3 people each.

DRT House has one main house with air conditioning, infinity pool, queen size bed,

	    speaker, gas stove, rice cooker, kettle, complete kitchen utensils, fresh linen
	    and blankets, and ihawan, as well as one Bahay Kubo that can accommodate
